sentences.sContent: Both of these problems can lead to extremely high levels of overdraw.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both of these problems can lead to extremely high levels of overdraw.
sentences.sCn: 这些问题都会导致严重的透支。

sentences.sContent: Particles: reduce overdraw, use the simplest possible shaders.
sentences.sContent_eng: Particles: reduce overdraw, use the simplest possible shaders.
sentences.sCn: 例子系统：降低透支，使用尽可能简单的着色器。

remMethod.val: over(过度) + draw(领取) → 过度领取 → 透支

words.tran: 过度指摘的；吹毛求疵的
超速档；[机] 超速传动
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
驱使过度；虐待；工作过度
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究

trans.tranOther: to draw on (a bank account) in excess of the credit balance
